      22             : class SpliceableJSONWriter;
      23             : class UniqueStacks;
      24             : 
      25             : /**
      26             :  * This is an abstract object that can be implied to supply
      27             :  * data to be attached with a profiler marker. Most data inserted
      28             :  * into a profile is stored in a circular buffer. This buffer
      29             :  * typically wraps around and overwrites most entries. Because
      30             :  * of this, this structure is designed to defer the work of
      31             :  * prepare the payload only when 'preparePayload' is called.
      32             :  *
      33             :  * Note when implementing that this object is typically constructed
      34             :  * on a particular thread but 'preparePayload' and the destructor
      35             :  * is called from the main thread.
      36             :  */
      37             : class ProfilerMarkerPayload
      38             : {
      39             : public:
      40             :   explicit ProfilerMarkerPayload(UniqueProfilerBacktrace aStack = nullptr);
      41             :   ProfilerMarkerPayload(const mozilla::TimeStamp& aStartTime,
      42             :                         const mozilla::TimeStamp& aEndTime,
      43             :                         UniqueProfilerBacktrace aStack = nullptr);
      44             : 
      45             :   /**
      46             :    * Called from the main thread
      47             :    */
      48             :   virtual ~ProfilerMarkerPayload();
      49             : 
      50             :   /**
      51             :    * Called from the main thread
      52             :    */
      53             :   virtual void StreamPayload(SpliceableJSONWriter& aWriter,
      54             :                              const mozilla::TimeStamp& aStartTime,
      55             :                              UniqueStacks& aUniqueStacks) = 0;
      56             : 
      57             :   mozilla::TimeStamp GetStartTime() const { return mStartTime; }
      58             : 
      59             : protected:
      60             :   /**
      61             :    * Called from the main thread
      62             :    */
      63             :   void streamCommonProps(const char* aMarkerType,
      64             :                          SpliceableJSONWriter& aWriter,
      65             :                          const mozilla::TimeStamp& aStartTime,
      66             :                          UniqueStacks& aUniqueStacks);
      67             : 
      68           0 :   void SetStack(UniqueProfilerBacktrace aStack) { mStack = mozilla::Move(aStack); }
      69             : 
      70             : private:
      71             :   mozilla::TimeStamp  mStartTime;
      72             :   mozilla::TimeStamp  mEndTime;
      73             :   UniqueProfilerBacktrace  mStack;
      74             : };
